name: AS-TRON demo
description:
AS -TRON is a 2d space based top-down shooter game, its my first game and it's still incomplete, it has some (ehm...) bugs, hope you enjoy it !

controls : move : wasd  //  dash : spacebar  //  shoot : mouse left click.

pls don't forget to give your opinions.

P.D: for the mobile version the UI scales well only on 16:9 resolution screens.
